mcq_data.question_content: 20 A wire is being stretched by a tensile force.  Which statement about the elastic limit must be correct?

options.A: The distance from a peak to the next trough is equal to a wavelength.
options.B: They can be demonstrated in ripple tanks.
options.D: They transfer energy from one position to another.

mcq_data.question_content: 27 A stationary wave on a stretched string is set up between two points P and T.  P Q R S T vibrator   Which statement about the stationary wave is correct?

options.A: Point R is at a node.
options.B: Points Q and S vibrate in phase.
options.C: The distance between P and T is three wavelengths.
options.D: The wave transfers energy from P to T.

mcq_data.question_content: 40 A neutron is composed of one up (u) quark and two down (d) quarks. When a neutron decays to a proton, a beta-particle is emitted.  What is the change in the quark structure of the neutron due to the emission of the beta-particle?  (The symbol for a neutrino is e and for an antineutrino is e  .)

options.A: ssessment International Education Copyright Acknowledgements Booklet. This is produced for each series of examinations and is freely available to download
options.C: ambridge Assessment International Education is part of Cambridge Assessment. Cambridge Assessment is the brand name of the University of Cambridge
